<style>

.v3_customer-logos-marquee-group {
  animation: marquee 75s linear infinite;
}

.v3_customer-logos-marquee-group.small {
  animation: marquee 140s linear infinite;
}

@keyframes marquee {
  0% {
    transform: translateX(0);
  }
  100% {
    transform: translateX(calc(-100% - 5rem));
  }
}

@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {

  
  .v3_customer-logos-marquee-wrapper:not(.small) .v3_customer-logos-marquee-group img {
    height: 1.125rem;
  }

}

</style>


<script>


// >> SOLUTIONS PAGE - SHOW RELEVANT LOGO GROUP BY URL PATH (Variant must be "Base")
const urlPathSegments = window.location.pathname.split("/").filter(segment => segment !== "");
const lastUrlPathSegment = urlPathSegments[urlPathSegments.length - 1];

switch(lastUrlPathSegment) {
  case 'ecommerce':
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.ecommerce').style.display = 'flex';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.global').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.saas').style.display = 'none';
  break;
  case 'global':
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.ecommerce').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.global').style.display = 'flex';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.saas').style.display = 'none';
  break;
  case 'saas':
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.ecommerce').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.global').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.saas').style.display = 'flex';
  break;
  default:
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.ecommerce').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.global').style.display = 'flex';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.saas').style.display = 'none';
}


// << SOLUTIONS PAGE - SHOW RELEVANT LOGO GROUP BY URL PATH (Variant must be "Base")


// Duplicate logo group
const customerLogosMarqueeGroup = document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-group');
const clonedCustomerLogosMarqueeGroup = customerLogosMarqueeGroup.cloneNode(true);
clonedCustomerLogosMarqueeGroup.id = 'clonedCustomerLogosMarqueeGroup';
customerLogosMarqueeGroup.parentNode.insertBefore(clonedCustomerLogosMarqueeGroup, customerLogosMarqueeGroup);


</script>

<script>


// >> SOLUTIONS PAGE - SHOW RELEVANT LOGO GROUP BY URL PATH (Variant must be "Base")
const urlPathSegments = window.location.pathname.split("/").filter(segment => segment !== "");
const lastUrlPathSegment = urlPathSegments[urlPathSegments.length - 1];

switch(lastUrlPathSegment) {
  case 'ecommerce':

    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.saas').style.display = 'none';
  break;
  case 'global':
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.ecommerce').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.global').style.display = 'flex';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.saas').style.display = 'none';
  break;
  case 'saas':
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.ecommerce').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.global').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.saas').style.display = 'flex';
  break;
  default:
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.ecommerce').style.display = 'none';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.global').style.display = 'flex';
    document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-logos.saas').style.display = 'none';
}


// << SOLUTIONS PAGE - SHOW RELEVANT LOGO GROUP BY URL PATH (Variant must be "Base")


// Duplicate logo group
const customerLogosMarqueeGroup = document.querySelector('.v3_customer-logos-marquee-group');
const clonedCustomerLogosMarqueeGroup = customerLogosMarqueeGroup.cloneNode(true);
clonedCustomerLogosMarqueeGroup.id = 'clonedCustomerLogosMarqueeGroup';
customerLogosMarqueeGroup.parentNode.insertBefore(clonedCustomerLogosMarqueeGroup, customerLogosMarqueeGroup);


</script>

data.html:
Frequently asked questions

Let’s set your mind at ease.

Can’t find the answer you’re looking for? Reach out to our customer support team.

Where can I read the API documentation?

Our API documentation is available here.

How do I get started with the API?

You’ll first want to book a demo with a member of our team. After that, you can generate test API keys from your dashboard to integrate and test the API functionalities.

What SDKs are available?

Users can choose from three available SDKs: Java, Python, and Ruby. We have documentation for direct integration with our public endpoint if you have a different technology stack.

Is the API setup to handle multiple different currencies?

We support tracking the currencies used for Customer Currency, Filing Currency, and Functional Currency.

Can the API handle shipping and handling charges?

Shipping and handling charges should be treated as their own distinct products and line items. When it’s time to calculate taxes, you can pass the shipping costs as another line item to the tax/calculations endpoint.

data.html:
Calculate sales tax for every transaction

Numeral calculates the correct tax rate based on your customer’s location and purchased products.

Built for performance and scale, our API ensures seamless, real-time calculations to keep your checkout and billing experience smooth. Battle-tested under peak demand, Numeral is ready for Black Friday and beyond.

Our platform for compliance

Stay ahead of ever-changing sales tax laws without the stress. With Numeral’s end-to-end platform, you’ll spend less than five minutes a month on compliance.

We take care of rate calculations, registrations, filing, remittance, exemption certificates, and more — so you can focus on growing your business.

Integrate with your stack

Numeral connects with the tools and billing systems you already use, making setup fast and effortless.

Sync your sales data, automate tax calculations, and pipe rates to where you need them without disrupting your workflow.

data.html:
Frequently asked questions

Let’s set your mind at ease.

Can’t find the answer you’re looking for? Reach out to our customer support team.

Where can I read the API documentation?

Our API documentation is available here.

How do I get started with the API?

You’ll first want to book a demo with a member of our team. After that, you can generate test API keys from your dashboard to integrate and test the API functionalities.

What SDKs are available?

Users can choose from three available SDKs: Java, Python, and Ruby. We have documentation for direct integration with our public endpoint if you have a different technology stack.

Is the API setup to handle multiple different currencies?

We support tracking the currencies used for Customer Currency, Filing Currency, and Functional Currency.

Can the API handle shipping and handling charges?

Shipping and handling charges should be treated as their own distinct products and line items. When it’s time to calculate taxes, you can pass the shipping costs as another line item to the tax/calculations endpoint.

We support tracking the currencies used for Customer Currency, Filing Currency, and Functional Currency.

data.html:
Can the API handle shipping and handling charges?

Shipping and handling charges should be treated as their own distinct products and line items. When it’s time to calculate taxes, you can pass the shipping costs as another line item to the tax/calculations endpoint.
data.text: Can the API handle shipping and handling charges?Shipping and handling charges should be treated as their own distinct products and line items. When it’s time to calculate taxes, you can pass the shipping costs as another line item to the tax/calculations endpoint.

data.html:
Calculate sales tax for every transaction

Numeral calculates the correct tax rate based on your customer’s location and purchased products.

Built for performance and scale, our API ensures seamless, real-time calculations to keep your checkout and billing experience smooth. Battle-tested under peak demand, Numeral is ready for Black Friday and beyond.

Our platform for compliance

Stay ahead of ever-changing sales tax laws without the stress. With Numeral’s end-to-end platform, you’ll spend less than five minutes a month on compliance.

We take care of rate calculations, registrations, filing, remittance, exemption certificates, and more — so you can focus on growing your business.

Integrate with your stack

Numeral connects with the tools and billing systems you already use, making setup fast and effortless.

Sync your sales data, automate tax calculations, and pipe rates to where you need them without disrupting your workflow.

data.html:
<style>

.v3_email-collect-form-embed form {
  border: 1px solid var(--v3-colors--v3-gray-warm-500);
  border-radius: 0.75rem;
  background:  var(--v3-colors--v3-base-white);
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  display: flex;
  height: 2.875rem;
  padding: .1875rem;
  position: relative;
}

.v3_footer .v3_email-collect-form-embed form {
  border: none;
  background: var(--v3-colors--v3-base-white);
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-form-field {
  position: relative;
  max-width: 65%;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-form-field .input {
  max-width: 100%;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-form-field > label {
  display: none;
}


.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-input {
  color: var(--v3-colors--v3-gray-iron-600);
  background: transparent;
  border: none;
  margin-bottom: 0;
  font-family: var(--v3-fonts--twk-continental);
  font-size: 1rem;
  font-weight: 400;
  line-height: 140%;
  padding: 0 1rem;
  field-sizing: content;
  max-width: 100%;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-input::selection {
  background: black;
}

.v3_footer-cta .v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-input {
  color: var(--v3-colors--v3-gray-iron-600);
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-input:focus-visible {
  outline: none;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-error-msgs {
  position: absolute;
  background: #ff3100cf;
  top: 3rem;
  left: 0;
  z-index: 1000;
  width: max-content;
  padding: 0.75rem;
  list-style: none;
  border-radius: 0.5rem;
  margin: 0;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  grid-row-gap: 0.25rem;
  box-shadow: 5px 5px 5px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.25);
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-error-msg {
  background: transparent;
  font-family: var(--v3-fonts--twk-continental);
  font-size: 0.825rem;
  font-weight: 600;
  color: #fff;
  padding: 0;
  border: none;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs_error_rollup {
  position: absolute;
  top: 150%;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-submit {
  background-color: var(--v3-colors--v3-orange-700);
  height: 100%;
  border-radius: .5rem;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  box-shadow: 0px 1px 3px 0px rgba(10, 13, 18, 0.10), 0px 1px 2px -1px rgba(10, 13, 18, 0.10);
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-submit:hover {
  background-color: var(--v3-colors--v3-orange-800);
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-submit:active {
  box-shadow: none;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-submit .actions {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
}

.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs-submit input {
  background: transparent;
  border: none;
  font-family: var(--v3-fonts--twk-continental);
  font-size: 1rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  color: var(--v3-colors--v3-base-white);
  white-space: nowrap;
  width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
  padding: 0 1rem;
  cursor: pointer;
}


.v3_email-collect-form-embed input:-webkit-autofill,
.v3_email-collect-form-embed input:-webkit-autofill:hover, 
.v3_email-collect-form-embed input:-webkit-autofill:focus, 
.v3_email-collect-form-embed input:-webkit-autofill:active {
  transition: background-color 5000s;
  -webkit-text-fill-color: var(--white) !important;
}


.v3_email-collect-form-embed .hs_error_rollup {
  display: none !important;
}

@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {

	.v3_email-collect-form-embed {
    width: 100%;
  }
  
 .v3_email-collect-form-embed form {
  	border: none;
  	background: transparent;
	}
